title: Charles Manson and Manson Family Parole Hearings
description:
Court TV special from the 1990s on Charles Manson and his Family, featuring footage from some previous parole hearings for Charles Manson, Leslie Van Houten, Patricia Krenwinkel and Bruce Davis as well as interviews with former Family members Bruce Davis and Bobby Beausoleil, an interview with former prosecutor Vincent Bugliosi (not sure if fellow prosecutor Steven Kay also makes an appearance) and the obligatory archival footage from the 1970 trial circus.



Torrent Information:
====================

File type: AVI
File size: 390 MB
